Name: Octo Gravity
About the game: Jump and run in an octagon full of obstacles and overcome your own records! Gameplay Survive in an octagon while overcoming various obstacles like lasers, thorns and gravity. The octagon is spinning, providing a greater challenge. The longer you survive the harder it gets. Local Multiplayer You can play with 4 players and see who can survive for longer. At the end of the match is shown how long each of the players managed to stay alive. Features Challenging arcade gameplay that constantly gets harder Simple controls: the character moves and jumps Local Multiplayer to challenge your friends. Game translation in 9 languages (If something isn't right, please tell us) Partial controller support Achievements Musics: 'System Shock', 'Fractal', 'Disco Century',' 'Laser Millenium', 'Miami Souls', by neocrey is licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0
